description: Cipher Pol Number 9 - A secret World Government agency specializing in covert assassination and espionage. Unlike other Cipher Pol units focused on intelligence gathering, CP9 is authorized to kill in the name of 'Dark Justice'.

enemies.reason: CP9 framed the Straw Hats and opposed Robin's crew
CP9 attacked Galley-La headquarters and shot Iceburg to obtain Pluton blueprints

keyMoments.title: Coordinated Attack on Galley-La
keyMoments.description: CP9 launches their coordinated operation to obtain the Pluton blueprints, using a massive explosion as their signal to begin the assault.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the culmination of CP9's five-year undercover operation in Water 7.

keyMoments.title: CP9's Five-Year Mission Revealed
keyMoments.description: The episode reveals that CP9 agents have been working undercover for five years with the sole purpose of obtaining the ancient weapon Pluton's blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the scope and patience of World Government operations and their interest in ancient weapons.

symbol.description: CP9 identification and World Government affiliation
symbol.meaning: Represents the World Government's secret intelligence and assassination division

description: Water 7's premier shipbuilding company, founded and led by Iceburg. The company unified all of Water 7's shipyards under one organization and is renowned throughout the world for their exceptional shipbuilding craftsmanship.

enemies.reason: CP9 infiltrated and attacked Galley-La to steal the Pluton blueprints

keyMoments.title: Headquarters Under Attack
keyMoments.description: Galley-La headquarters is attacked by CP9 with a massive explosion, and shipwrights throughout the building are defeated by the masked infiltrators.
keyMoments.significance: The company's headquarters becomes a battleground, revealing the infiltration of CP9 agents among their ranks.

keyMoments.title: President Iceburg Shot
keyMoments.description: Company president Iceburg is shot by CP9 agent Blueno in his own office during the raid.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vulnerability of even the company's leadership to CP9's operation.

goals.goal: Build the finest ships in the world

symbol.meaning: Represents Water 7's shipbuilding excellence and craftsmanship
